title: Red Bull Has Faith Roglič Is Not Too Old to Match Pogačar at the Tour de France: ‘He’s Not Reached His Ceiling’
content:
Red Bull-Bora-Hansgrohe still backs 35-year-old Roglič in his eternal quest to win the Tour de France after 'big disaster' of 2024 crash and DNF.

Read the full article at Red Bull Has Faith Roglič Is Not Too Old to Match Pogačar at the Tour de France: ‘He’s Not Reached His Ceiling’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
